title: Trading my pre-war HOF for your '54 Aaron or '56 Mantle
author: vintagetoppsguy

posts.post_title: Trading my pre-war HOF for your '54 Aaron or '56 Mantle
posts.post_content:
The title says it all.  I am looking for a '54 Aaron or '56 Mantle in EX to Ex/Mt condtion, well centered (would prefer graded).  I would also consider a '55 Koufax or Clemente in similar condition.  

I'm not looking to sell or trade for other cards right now.  I'm just trying to complete a couple of '50s sets and thought I would use these as trade bait.  

[url]http://s185.photobucket.com/albums/x137/vintagetoppsguy/Pre-War%20Cards/#!cpZZ1QQtppZZ20[/url]
